name: DBPedia
query_template: SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?itemDescription WHERE {{ ?item rdfs:label "{term}"@en. ?item rdfs:label ?itemLabel. ?item rdfs:comment ?itemDescription. FILTER (lang(?itemLabel) = "en" && lang(?itemDescription) = "en") }} LIMIT 5

name: Getty
query_template: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?resource ?label ?description WHERE {{ ?resource rdfs:label "{term}"@en. ?resource rdfs:label ?label. FILTER (lang(?label) = "en") ?resource skos:scopeNote ?scopeNoteURI. ?scopeNoteURI rdf:value ?description. FILTER (lang(?description) = "en") }}

name: Wikidata
query_template: SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?itemDescription WHERE {{ ?item ?p "{term}"@en. ?article schema:about ?item. ?article schema:inLanguage "en". ?article schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/>. SERVICE wikibase:label {{ bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }} }} LIMIT 5
